title: Sanctuary of Apollo at Halieis
description: The Sanctuary of Apollo at Halieis is a temple complex dedicated primarily to Apollo, constructed outside of the city of Halieis and dating between the seventh and fourth centuries BCE.

properties.description: Point marking location of modern town of Portocheli. The Sanctuary of Apollo at Halieis is submerged near the east end of the harbor of Portocheli and is no longer visible. See plan in Jameson 1974, p. 113.
properties.title: OSM location of modern Portocheli appended
